titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4297) to provide for reconciliation pursuant to section 201(b) of the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 2006.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 109-330, by Mr. Putnam.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 4297 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Measure will be considered read. A specified amendment is in order.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 128.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 588.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 12/8/2005--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4297) to provide for reconciliation under the concurrent resolution on the budget for FY2006.
